column4: hey guys, two questions. 1) what "service" and "port" does irc run on? 2) how do i get a non-repository executable file to run? (it seems to be blocked by default) thnx
so i downloaded a program i want to use in wine, but its blocked by default as an executable (presumably because it wasn't download via repository). how can i bypass this?
stat7ic: actually that worked for irc, thank you.
Or, if you are at the command line, you can type "chmod +x /path/to/file"
